channel.title: CVE Feed for numanrki -- AADMY – Add Auto Date Month Year Into Posts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for numanrki -- AADMY – Add Auto Date Month Year Into Posts

item.title: CVE-2024-9837|2024-10-15T07:30:33.772Z -- numanrki -- aadmy%20%E2%80%93%20add%20auto%20date%20month%20year%20into%20posts
item.description: The The AADMY – Add Auto Date Month Year Into Posts plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.1. This is due to the software allowing users to execute an action that does not properly validate a value before running do_shortcode. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes.
